login.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
login.alreadyAccount: Already have an account? Sign In
login.resetPasswordSuccess: If an account exists for this email, a reset link has been sent.
login.signUpSuccess: Sign up successful! Please check your email to confirm your account.

index.mainGoalDescription: View and edit your main goal.
index.mainGoalPlaceholder: Ex: Become Sales Director in 2 years, Run a marathon in under 3h30, Launch my SaaS startup...
index.domainsDescription: Here's an initial suggestion of key domains to achieve your goal. We'll customize them in the next step.
index.customizeDomainsDescription: Edit, delete, or reorder these domains. You must select between 1 and 8.
index.customizeDomainsAlertDescription: You must have between 1 and 8 domains. You currently have {{count}}.
index.newDomainDescription: Add a new action domain to get closer to your goal.
index.readyToStartDescription: Double-check your goal and action domains. This is the beginning of your journey to success.
index.goalWizardStep1Description: Be precise and ambitious. This is the starting point of your success.
index.goalWizardStep2Description: Answer these few questions to clarify your vision.
index.goalWizardStep3Description: Here's an initial suggestion of key domains to achieve your goal. We'll customize them in the next step.
index.goalWizardStep4Description: Edit, delete, or reorder these domains. You must select between 1 and 8.
index.goalWizardStep5Description: Double-check your goal and action domains. This is the beginning of your journey to success.
index.domainCardDeleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this domain?
index.domainCardDeleteConfirmDescription: This action is irreversible. The domain "{{domainTitle}}" will be permanently deleted.
index.domainCardDeleteTaskWarning: Warning: {{taskCount}} associated task(s) will also be deleted.
index.domainCardTooltip: Does this domain directly contribute to your goal?
index.addDomainCardDescription: Add a new action domain to get closer to your goal.
index.projectSetupSuccess: Your plan has been created successfully!
index.projectSetupError: An error occurred while creating your plan.
index.maxDomainsError: You cannot add more than 8 domains.

kanban.taskDeleteConfirmDescription: This action is irreversible. The task will be permanently deleted.
kanban.searchTasksPlaceholder: Search tasks by content or description...

calendar.noTasksForDay: No tasks scheduled for this day.
calendar.noPrioritizedTasksDescription: Add tasks with end dates or mark them as priority to see them here!

accomplishments.title: Your Accomplished Goals
accomplishments.noAccomplishmentsDescription: Complete your first goal to see it appear here!

completionModal.title: Goal Achieved!
completionModal.description: Congratulations! You've accomplished your goal: "{{goalTitle}}". This is a major achievement. What would you like to do now?
